alert.note: Alert for Creek (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 04 at 7:09PM CDT until May 04 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Creek County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 709 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles northwest of Bristow, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations in or near the path include... Bristow... Sapulpa... Mannford... Kellyville... Depew... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 182 and 212. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northeastern Oklahoma. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
